00008 #include "Jaguar.h"
00009 #include "DigitalModule.h"
00010 
00014 void Jaguar::InitJaguar()
00015 {
00016     /*
00017      * Input profile defined by Luminary Micro.
00018      * 
00019      * Full reverse ranges from 0.671325ms to 0.6972211ms
00020      * Proportional reverse ranges from 0.6972211ms to 1.4482078ms
00021      * Neutral ranges from 1.4482078ms to 1.5517922ms
00022      * Proportional forward ranges from 1.5517922ms to 2.3027789ms
00023      * Full forward ranges from 2.3027789ms to 2.328675ms
00024      */
00025     SetBounds(251, 135, 128, 120, 4);
00026     SetPeriodMultiplier(kPeriodMultiplier_1X);
00027     SetRaw(m_centerPwm);
00028 }
00029 
00035 Jaguar::Jaguar(UINT32 channel) : SafePWM(channel)
00036 {
00037     InitJaguar();
00038 }
00039 
00046 Jaguar::Jaguar(UINT32 slot, UINT32 channel) : SafePWM(slot, channel)
00047 {
00048     InitJaguar();
00049 }

00051 Jaguar::~Jaguar()
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00064 void Jaguar::Set(float speed, UINT8 syncGroup)
00065 {
00066     SetSpeed(speed);
00067 }
00068 
00074 float Jaguar::Get()
00075 {
00076     return GetSpeed();
00077 }
00078 
00082 void Jaguar::Disable()
00083 {
00084     SetRaw(kPwmDisabled);
00085 }
00086 
00092 void Jaguar::PIDWrite(float output)
00093 {
00094     Set(output);
00095 }
